items.title: Awesome Nix Updates on Mar 22 - Mar 28, 2021
items.summary: 30 awesome projects updated on Mar 22 - Mar 28, 2021
items.content_text:
### Resources / Learning

*   [nix.dev](https://nix.dev/) - An opinionated guide for developers about getting things done using the Nix ecosystem.
*   [Tour of Nix](https://nixcloud.io/tour) - An online interactive tutorial on Nix language constructs.

### Installation Media / Discovery

*   [nixos-generators (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/nix-community/nixos-generators) -  Take a NixOS config and build multiple different images types including VirtualBox VMs, Azure images, and installation ISOs.

### Channel History / Discovery

*   [Channel History](https://channels.nix.gsc.io) - Get historical git commits for Nix channels.
*   [Nix Infra Status](https://status.nixos.org) - Get the age and current git commit of each Nix channel.

### Deployment Tools / Discovery

*   [krops](https://cgit.krebsco.de/krops/about/) - A lightweight toolkit to deploy NixOS systems, remotely or locally.
*   [KuberNix (‚≠ê785)](https://github.com/saschagrunert/kubernix) - Single-dependency Kubernetes clusters via Nix packages.
*   [NixOps (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/NixOS/nixops) - The official Nix deployment tool, compatible with AWS, Hetzner, and more.
*   [terraform-nixos (‚≠ê369)](https://github.com/tweag/terraform-nixos) - A set of Terraform modules designed to deploy NixOS.

### Command-Line Tools / Discovery

*   [nix-index (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/bennofs/nix-index) - Quickly locate Nix packages with specific files.
*   [nix-prefetch (‚≠ê134)](https://github.com/msteen/nix-prefetch) - A universal tool for updating source checksums.

### Development / Discovery

*   [Arion (‚≠ê768)](https://github.com/hercules-ci/arion) - Run `docker-compose` with help from Nix/NixOS.
*   [cached-nix-shell (‚≠ê221)](https://github.com/xzfc/cached-nix-shell) - A `nix-shell` replacement that uses caching to open subsequent shells quickly.
*   [Cachix](https://cachix.org/) - Hosted binary cache service; free for open-source projects.
*   [gitignore.nix (‚≠ê262)](https://github.com/hercules-ci/gitignore.nix) - The most feature-complete and easy-to-use `.gitignore` integration.
*   [niv (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/nmattia/niv/) - Easy dependency management for Nix projects with package pinning.
*   [nix-direnv (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/nix-community/nix-direnv) - A fast loader and flake-compliant configuration for the direnv environment auto-loader.
*   [nixpkgs-review (‚≠ê505)](https://github.com/Mic92/nixpkgs-review) - The best tool to verify that a pull-request in Nixpkgs is building properly.

### Programming Languages / Haskell

*   [cabal2nix (‚≠ê376)](https://github.com/NixOS/cabal2nix) - Converts a Cabal file into a Nix build expression.
*   [haskell.nix (‚≠ê593)](https://github.com/input-output-hk/haskell.nix) - Alternative Haskell Infrastructure for Nixpkgs.

### Programming Languages / PureScript

*   [Easy PureScript Nix (‚≠ê203)](https://github.com/justinwoo/easy-purescript-nix) - A project to easily use PureScript and other tools with Nix.

### Programming Languages / Python

*   [poetry2nix (‚≠ê925)](https://github.com/nix-community/poetry2nix) - Build Python packages directly from [Poetry's](https://python-poetry.org/) `poetry.lock`. No conversion step needed.

### Programming Languages / Ruby

*   [Bundix (‚≠ê174)](https://github.com/nix-community/bundix) - Generates a Nix expression for your Bundler-managed application.

### Programming Languages / Rust

*   [naersk (‚≠ê837)](https://github.com/nmattia/naersk) - Build Rust packages directly from `Cargo.lock`. No conversion step needed.
*   [rust-nix-templater (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/yusdacra/rust-nix-templater) - Generates Nix build and development files for Rust projects.

### NixOS Modules / Zig

*   [musnix (‚≠ê755)](https://github.com/musnix/musnix) - Do real-time audio work in NixOS.
*   [Simple Nixos Mailserver](https://gitlab.com/simple-nixos-mailserver/nixos-mailserver) - A complete mailserver, managed with NixOS modules.

### Overlays / Webinterface

*   [awesome-nix-hpc (‚≠ê87)](https://github.com/freuk/awesome-nix-hpc) - High Performance Computing package sets.
*   [NUR (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/nix-community/NUR/) - Nix User Repositories. The mother of all overlays, allowing access to user repositories and installing packages via attributes.

### Community / Webinterface

*   [Discourse](https://discourse.nixos.org/) - The best place to get help and discuss Nix-related topics.
